text:
Grep for "michi" or "username" and see that this is hardcoded in way too many
places.
creator: egli@apache.org
gregor@apache.org
text:
i fixed some of the obvious ones, and most of the rest are unused java
properties. michi will blast some more too.

that said while this is not nice it is a lot better than it used to be and thus
this is 1.4 material.
